ISSUE.TITLE: "Service Timeout" with GitHub Enterprise
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, All my GitHub Enterprise web hook calls get a "Service Timeout": ![screen shot 2014-11-21 at 17 09 33](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2472064/5145252/84775010-71a1-11e4-9b16-d12d95ea0b0a.png) There is no error in `/var/log/upstart/drone.log` Our internal GitHub Enterprise's SSL certificate is btw signed by an internal root certificate, not by a public one. Can this be an issue? I've added the root certificate of the GitHub Enterprise instance to the Ubuntu key store of the Drone.io server. Is that enough? Does the Go application recognize the certificate? Thanks, Michael

COMMIT.MESSAGE: return 422 in case of merge conflicts (#724)
